title: "OMG! dont pick cait"
body:
person 1:*Locks in cait anyways*

person 2:"welp, we lost"

person2: *Locks in Irelia*

person 2: "Irelia is the most broken top laner right now"

































y u hate cait?

replies.body: I don't like cait because endless lane harrass and most annoying kit...
